definitions.text: an event in which something is displaced without rotation
a qualitative change
the time period during which you are at work
the act of changing one thing or position for another
examples: his switch on abortion cost him the election

definitions.text: the act of moving from one place to another
examples: his constant shifting disrupted the class

definitions.text: (geology) a crack in the earth's crust resulting from the displacement of one side with respect to the other
examples: they built it right over a geological fault
he studied the faulting of the earth's crust

definitions.text: a crew of workers who work for a specific period of time
the key on the typewriter keyboard that shifts from lower-case letters to upper-case letters
a woman's sleeveless undergarment
a loose-fitting dress hanging straight from the shoulders without a waist
make a shift in or exchange of
examples: First Joe led; then we switched

definitions.text: change place or direction
examples: Shift one's position

definitions.text: move around
examples: transfer the packet from his trouser pockets to a pocket in his jacket

definitions.text: move very slightly
examples: He shifted in his seat

definitions.text: move from one setting or context to another
examples: shift the emphasis
shift one's attention

definitions.text: change in quality
examples: His tone shifted

definitions.text: move and exchange for another
examples: shift the date for our class reunion

definitions.text: move sideways or in an unsteady way
examples: The ship careened out of control

definitions.text: move abruptly
examples: The ship suddenly lurched to the left

definitions.text: use a shift key on a keyboard
examples: She could not shift so all her letters are written in lower case

definitions.text: change phonetically as part of a systematic historical change
examples: Grimm showed how the consonants shifted

definitions.text: change gears
examples: you have to shift when you go down a steep hill

definitions.text: lay aside, abandon, or leave for another
examples: switch to a different brand of beer
She switched psychiatrists
The car changed lanes
